quote_first: Every day Patti Goss-Simpson brings four fish sticks to school and her Titan Deep Freeze lunchbox and every day at
quote_last: , because the cafeteria is being remodeled, Patti puts her terrible fish sticks in the terrible microwave at the back of Mr. Bates’ room and presses the terrible beepy buttons and the smell that pours out feels to Seymour like he’s being pressed face-first into a swamp.
title: Cloud Cuckoo Land
author: Anthony Doerr

quote_first: At any rate, we whirled into the station with many more, just as the great clock pointed to
quote_last: o’clock. “Thank God! We are in time,” said the young man, “and thank you, too, my friend, and your good horse.”
title: Black Beauty
author: Anna Sewell
